original_text: They asked this question for a reason. They wanted Jesus to say something wrong, so that they could punish him. But Jesus bent himself down. He started to write on the ground with his finger.
korean_text: 그들이 이렇게 말함은 고발할 조건을 얻고자 하여 예수를 시험함이러라 예수께서 몸을 굽히사 손가락으로 땅에 쓰시니

sentences.original_text: They asked this question for a reason.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 이유가 있어서 이 질문을 했습니다.

sentences.original_text: They wanted Jesus to say something wrong,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 예수님이 잘못된 말을 하길 원했고,

sentences.original_text: so that they could punish him.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그를 벌할 수 있기를 원했습니다.

sentences.original_text: He started to write on the ground with his finger.
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 손가락으로 땅에 글씨 쓰기를 시작하셨습니다.
